SEARCH
Package Helpers.ServerHelpers

Class Cafe

java.lang.Object
Helpers.ServerHelpers.Cafe
public class Cafe extends Object
A class that contains the 3 areas that drinks can be in and handles the moving of drinks between them, the list of clients currently in the cafe, the number of clients waiting for orders and the information for the drinks.

Uses a thread to continuously monitor the waitingArea and creates more threads to brew each drink.

  • Method Details

    • initDrinksSetup

      private void initDrinksSetup()
      Initializes the information for the drinks available in the cafe

    • isValidDrink

      public boolean isValidDrink(String drink)
      Checks if the drink provided is a recognised drink, also re-checks without the last character if it is 's'.
      Parameters:
      drink - String of drink to be checked
      Returns:
      true if the drink is in the drinkTypeByString map

    • getTypeOfDrink

      public Drink getTypeOfDrink(String drink)
      Returns a new instance of Drink dependent on the parameter.

      The parameterised drink is already known to exist at this point as isValidDrink(String) gets called before this method, if the parameter does not exist as a key in the map remove the last character, which will be 's'.

      Parameters:
      drink - String of drink
      Returns:
      a new Drink depending on the parameter

    • passInformationForLogging

      private void passInformationForLogging()
      Passes the relevant objects to Logging for it to be able to create logs.

    • startBrewing

      private void startBrewing()
      Continuously loops checking for drinks in waitingArea that be moved to brewingArea. Does multiple checks to ensure that the barista can actually process the drink dependent on the max brewing capacity of each drink.

    • moveDrinkFromWaitingToBrewingArea

      private void moveDrinkFromWaitingToBrewingArea(Drink drink)
      Move the drink from waitingArea to brewingArea as it has been selected to start processing.
      Parameters:
      drink - Drink to move

    • startBrewingDrink

      private void startBrewingDrink(Drink drink)
      Creates thread for brewing the drink, uses Thread.sleep(long) to simulate the brewing. Moves the drink to tray once brewed.
      Parameters:
      drink - Drink to start brewing

    • checkOrderComplete

      private void checkOrderComplete()
      Checks if any order has been completed, is called everytime a drink is brewed and added to the tray area, it is also called from whenever a Client leaves and their drinks get redistributed.

      If a client's order has been completed it calls removeCompletedOrderDrinksFromTray(Client) sends an order completed and sends an order complete action to the client and then from the client to the client's ClientInterface.

    • removeCompletedOrderDrinksFromTray

      private void removeCompletedOrderDrinksFromTray(Client client)
      Removes all client's drinks from trayArea.
      Parameters:
      client - The client whose order is complete

    • addClient

      public void addClient(Client client)
      Adds a Client to the clients list.
      Parameters:
      client - The client to add

    • addDrinksToWaitingArea

      public void addDrinksToWaitingArea(List<Drink> newDrinks)
      Adds all drinks to the waiting area
      Parameters:
      newDrinks - The drinks to add

    • contains

      public boolean contains(Client client)
      Check if client is in the cafe.
      Parameters:
      client - The client to check
      Returns:
      true if the client is in the cafe

    • removeClient

      public void removeClient(Client client)
      Removes Client from the clients list.
      Parameters:
      client - The client to remove

    • removeClientDrinksFromCafe

      public void removeClientDrinksFromCafe(Client clientLeaving)
      Removes all clientLeaving's drinks from the cafe. Checks afterwards if any orders have been completed.
      Parameters:
      clientLeaving - The client whose drinks are to be removed

    • removeClientDrinksFromWaitingArea

      private void removeClientDrinksFromWaitingArea(Client clientLeaving)
      Removes all clientLeaving's drinks from the waiting area.
      Parameters:
      clientLeaving - The client whose drinks are to be removed

    • redistributeDrinks

      private void redistributeDrinks(Client clientLeaving, ArrayList<Drink> area)
      Redistributes drinks from clientLeaving's drinks that are either in the trayArea or brewingArea.
      Parameters:
      clientLeaving - The client whose drinks are to be redistributed
      area - The area to redistribute drinks from

    • removeRemainingClientDrinksFromCafe

      private void removeRemainingClientDrinksFromCafe(Client clientLeaving)
      Removes all remaining drinks from the cafe from clientLeaving's drinks (if any).
      Parameters:
      clientLeaving - The client whose drinks are to be removed
